trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around March 10th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsA friend of mine and I were sitting on my patio when we noticed a strange light directly west of us. It was pretty high in the sky. It certainly was not a star, because it slowly moved around in the sky throughout the duration of our observations (about 2-3 hours). It was not a plane and not a helicopter. The light was intensely bright and pulsating. We viewed the object through binoculars- it seemed dense with vibrant color changing light. We attempted to drive to the object but it was difficult to pin point. I thought perhaps it might be a star, but I sit on my patio almost every night and have never seen anything in that position in the sky before. Also, the rate it was giving off light and changing colors was way too consistent and constant. And it relocated position. I am in awe of this object.
Summary: Pulsating light seen from my patio. Very vibrant, red-green-blue.
